question: What is the full form of BASIC?
option1: Beginners All Purpose Symbolic Instruction Code
option2: Basic All Purpose Synthesis Instruction Code
option3: Beginners All Purpose Symbolic Instruction Code
option4: Beginners All Possible Symbolic Instruction Code
answer: Beginners All Purpose Symbolic Instruction Code
explanation: BASIC stands for Beginners All Purpose Symbolic Instruction Code. It is a family of general-purpose, high-level programming languages whose design philosophy emphasizes ease of use.
